title: Pumpkin Spiced Latte w/ Espresso Machine
subtitle: How to make the best pumpkin spice latte at home with pumpkin puree, espresso, milk, and fall spices.
subtitle2: This drink is perfect for the fall season! It is simple to make and tastes superior to any store bought syrup or drink.
steps: In a small pot, combine the pumpkin pie mix, cinnamon, and milk.
Over medium heat, stir. Once it begins to simmer, remove from heat.
In a mug, add the espresso shot at the bottom. Pour the pumpkin pie milk mixture into the mug.
Top with whipped cream and enjoy immediately.
